biotools.summary: AbCPE web server implements a multi-label classification algorithm that predicts antibody class(es) for epitopes. This data driven machine learning based algorithm offers prediction of epitopes potentially recognised by an individual or multiple classes of antibodies viz. IgG, IgE, IgA and IgM (excluding IgD).

bioschemas.name: AbCPE
